description: Aromageddon is an idol unit composed of Aroma Kurosu and Mikan Shiratama. They presumably formed their unit prior to Episode 40. Their current goal is to team up with either SoLaMi♡SMILE or Dressing Pafé to form their dream team. They are disbanded by Aroma in Episode 47 and reformed in Episode 48.
name: Aromageddon
